verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
Nothing is impossible when you put your trust in God.
Nothing is impossible when you're trusting in His Word.
Hearken to the voice of God to thee:
" Is there anything to hard for Me? "

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
Then put your trust in God,
alone and rest upon His Word;
For every thing,
oh everything, yes every thing is poissble with God!

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
I read in the Bible the promise of God,
That nothing for Him is too hard.

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
Impossible things He has promised to do
If we faithfully trust in His Word.

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
"All things are possible, " Is His Word.
Recieve it, 'tis written for you.
Believe in His promises,
God cannot fail;

verse.name: v2c
verse.lines:
For what He has said
He will do.
Creator of all things,
with infinite pow'r.
He spoke they appeared by His mouth.
Impossible things are not known unto Him
He made us,
He ruleth the earth.

verse.name: c1c
verse.lines:
Nothing is impossible when you put your trust in God.
Nothing is impossible when you're trusting in His Word.
Hearken to the voice of God to thee:

verse.name: c1d
verse.lines:
" Is there anything to hard for Me? "
Then put your trust in God,
alone and rest upon His Word;
For every thing,
oh everything, yes every thing is possible with God!
